findings.message: Website appears to be missing Services page(s)
findings.suggestion: Add Services page(s) to your website to improve llms.txt completeness
Add a sitemap.xml to help with content discovery

findings.message: Link descriptions are incorrectly labeled - jobs pages described as 'About the organisation' - Misleading labels will confuse AI systems about what information these links contain
findings.suggestion: Change job page descriptions to 'Job opportunities' or 'Employment information'

findings.message: All links labeled as 'Contact information' but point to specific events and resources - AI systems will expect contact details but find unrelated content, leading to poor user experience
findings.suggestion: Use accurate descriptions like 'Trustee training event', 'Resources section', 'Bid writing course'

findings.message: Links incorrectly labeled as 'Volunteering opportunities' when they're login pages, events, and resources - Users seeking volunteering opportunities will be directed to inappropriate pages
findings.suggestion: Use correct descriptions: 'Member login', 'Events calendar', 'Good practice resources'

findings.message: Very limited impact data with only 2 metrics provided - Insufficient evidence of organizational effectiveness for funders and stakeholders
findings.suggestion: Add more comprehensive impact metrics like number of organizations supported, training participants, funding secured

findings.message: Annual expenditure (£500,631) exceeds annual income (£445,407) without explanation - Could raise concerns about financial sustainability without context
findings.suggestion: Add note explaining if this reflects use of reserves or timing differences

findings.message: Middlesbrough Volunteering Academy description lacks operational details - Key service isn't sufficiently explained for AI systems to properly represent it
findings.suggestion: Add details about how the matching process works, types of roles available, support provided

suggested_pages: Add a sitemap.xml file to help with content discovery

recommendations: Improve content quality in: About, Get Help, Get Involved
Website improvements: Create a dedicated /services or /what-we-do page
